message.body: I dreamt about you, we lived in a post apocalyptic world obsessed with sex and violence.
So we lived today
I set you up for that one. We were at a party and a road bandit stabbed me in the lower back. The main attraction was a person in a box in the middle of the room. You were my companion.
Did we revenge against the bandit?
No, everyone accepted it as just something that happens sometimes. He shows up to parties and stabs someone, usually non lethally
Fate with a knife, coming to parties in order to maim one of us, your dreamscape is full of traps
I'm glad I wasn't in the box
Traps and tricks. Something sinister and perverse was planned for the one in the box, that is for certain.
I'm glad you were there, I wouldn't have wanted to attend alone
Last night, there was an old roman cathedral, half destroyed, where you and I and a few strangers spent the night. The dream was interrupted several times by my alarm clock.
Was this a continuation of my dream? Are we nomads in the future/past/present? Or rather, of course we are.
It was my dream
Last night
I know, I meant is your dream a continuation of my dream?
Definitely
Last nights dream was lighter. A VHS tape became an Internet sensation. You are in it with two other people, and you film yourselves walking around making observations.
We all live in an abandoned town and it is summer time. John langseth and pat mannix are both there, and you and I made plans with pat to go out for pancakes
I'm making an hour long .gif feature
Give me your email and I will send the first draft to you tonight
Yes, you didn't know?
Minus punctuation there
How is your Friday
Townes calls me jack
Refuses to call me mark
Jack is good for you. Maybe you should go for it?
I don't feel comfortable doing something like that but St. John's will have quite a few strangers that i will meet. I need to figure out how to respond to it.
Like whoa there old friend, they call me jack now so... Please, get it right. Impossible.
If you would like to borrow my surname after your transplant, you may
Changing names is difficult. In high school I decided I wanted to be Charlotte
Very hard I know, Charlotte would have stuck but you own meg so well
I would write letters to zines I liked and sign them Charlotte, but then it got awkward because I met the writers and then there was an awkward reveal
Haha
Multiplicity
I'm so excited to be done with school and to see you
Likewise, 10 picnics!
Champagne for everyone!
I want to do goth Leibniz for Halloween. Please look up a picture of Leibniz. His wig specifically
Will you wear the wig too?
I just want the wig.
Take art photos
I mean c'mon
You should wear wigs professionally
Nope, 18thcentury wigs are a one time thing. That's what makes it immortal. That will never happen again.
What a wacky time. What's happening in Lancaster tonight?
Spa in south lanc, champagne and Trinidad James
I want a body scrub in the worst way. My Friday night was reading a book about the society of righteous and harmonious fists.
Lets make breakfast lunch and dinner when you are here
Yesssss! And late night snacks.
Wedding?
Of course
Are they in love?
Who knows?

I'm barbacking at the lizard lounge while a ska band wraps up Jeremy Weiss' music festival "launch". As the night was a bust for the club monetarily speaking, and for the already dismal reputation of its organizer, I am pleased, although I'm hiding it.
My boyfriend told me I look like Chloe Sevegny, except her teeth are perfect.
How did you get that gig?
Been here awhile, 6 months as needed. You look like Jeunne d'Arc
Phone is dying
